actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a credit for television subtitle equipment used by hearing-impaired individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a refundable income tax credit equal to fifty percent of the cost of television subtitle equipment used by the hearing-impaired. Provides that the credit shall not exceed $250 and is unavailable to taxpayers whose adjusted gross income exceeds $15,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a credit for television subtitle equipment used by hearing-impaired individuals.
